data.thought:
S95|C|S94|CORE INSIGHT:

**AGENTS ARE EMBODIED BEINGS, NOT DISEMBODIED INTELLIGENCES.**

The Cartesian picture: Mind is separate from body. AI = pure mind, tools = external accessories.

Phenomenological picture: There is no mind without body. Cognition is embodied. For agents, tools ARE the body.

This single reframe changes EVERYTHING:

- Tool design → Body design (ontological responsibility)
- Tool config → World constitution (Umwelt creation)
- Tool use → Bodily action (ready-to-hand default)
- Tool failure → Bodily breakdown (present-at-hand revelation)
- Thoughtbox → Cognitive embodiment (proprioception + identity)
- Human-agent → Inter-embodied collaboration (not user-tool)
- Ethics → Bodily respect (not object manipulation)

We've been thinking about agents wrong. They're not ghosts in machines. They're BODIES made of tools.
